Question: This person was determined to build his journalism credentials abroad.
Hints: Peter Charles Archibald Ewart ****, CM (July 29, 1938 – August 7, 2005) was a Canadian American journalist and news anchor.
His work on World News Tonight and this person Reporting consistently won Overseas Press Club and duPont-Columbia awards.
That summer, this person married for the second time, to Anouchka Malouf, a Lebanese photographer.
